title: Raddi (Giuseppe)
body: Italian botanist born in Florence on July 9, 1770, and died in Rhodes on September 6, 1829. He visited Madeira during his trip to Brazil and wrote a short work entitled Brevi Osservazioni sull' Isola di Madeira (Florence, 1821).

Brazil: Visited during his trip to Madeira

1821: Publication of Brevi Osservazioni sull' Isola di Madeira
